biotools.summary: The Conserved Transcription Factor Binding Site Finder (CONFAC) takes a list of human gene names and identifiers as input, and compares them with their mouse orthologues to identify conserved transcription factor binding sites.  Further information from the user allows CONFAC to identify binding sites that are enriched in the promoter regions of gene clusters from microarray analyses when compared to control gene sets.

bioschemas.name: CONFAC
